name: Taxi Car Drive & Parking Sim +
description:
Experience the life of a taxi driver in the latest taxi simulator game! Complete a dozen of challenging and interesting missions to advance! With over 10 cars to choose from, you have the freedom to drive any car that you want!
Some people are really in a hurry, so it is your responsibility to take them to their destination. Take the taxi simulation game idea to a new level with our game.

Enjoy the stunning graphics and visuals of our game which have been carefully crafted to run on a mobile device. Drive around the cities and explore the map!

FEATURES:
Explore a beautiful open world city map
Complete challenging taxi missions
Over 10 cars to choose from
Stunning graphics and visuals
Friendly user interface
